verses.verse: A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>. I will sing <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of mercy <S%H2617><s%> and judgment <S%H4941><s%>: unto thee, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, will I sing <S%H2167><s%> <S%H8762><s%>.

I will behave myself wisely <S%H7919><s%> <S%H8686><s%> in a perfect <S%H8549><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>. O when wilt thou come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me? I will walk <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8691><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> my house <S%H1004><s%> with a perfect <S%H8537><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%>.

I will set <S%H7896><s%> <S%H8799><s%> no wicked <S%H1100><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> before mine eyes <S%H5869><s%>: I hate <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the work <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of them that turn aside <S%H7750><s%>; it shall not cleave <S%H1692><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to me.
A froward <S%H6141><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%> shall depart <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from me: I will not know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a wicked <S%H7451><s%> person.

Whoso privily <S%H5643><s%> slandereth <S%H3960><s%> <S%H8764><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H3960><s%> <S%H8781><s%> his neighbour <S%H7453><s%>, him will I cut off <S%H6789><s%> <S%H8686><s%>: him that hath an high <S%H1362><s%> look <S%H5869><s%> and a proud <S%H7342><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%> will not I suffer <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

Mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall be upon the faithful <S%H539><s%> <S%H8737><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, that they may dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8800><s%> with me: he that walketh <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in a perfect <S%H8549><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>, he shall serve <S%H8334><s%> <S%H8762><s%> me.

He that worketh <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> deceit <S%H7423><s%> shall not dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> my house <S%H1004><s%>: he that telleth <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8802><s%> lies <S%H8267><s%> shall not tarry <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in my sight <S%H5869><s%>.

I will early <S%H1242><s%> destroy <S%H6789><s%> <S%H8686><s%> all the wicked <S%H7563><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>; that I may cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8687><s%> all wicked <S%H205><s%> doers <S%H6466><s%> <S%H8802><s%> from the city <S%H5892><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.
